gui.spectatorplus.config.title: SpectatorPlus
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.title: Client
gui.spectatorplus.config.server.title: LAN
gui.spectatorplus.config.server.descript: These settings will only affect the integrated server (singleplayer).
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.renderSt:
Renders the status icons (e.g. health, food,
experience) when spectating a player.
Show status when hotbar is hidden

Renders status indicators even when the hotbar
is hidden due to the server not having
the mod installed.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.renderHo:
Renders the hotbar of the spectated player.
Requires the mod to be installed server-side.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.renderAr: Renders the arms and held item of the spectated player.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.showSpec: Whether other players in spectator mode should be visible
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.highligh:
Whether other players in spectator mode should
be highlighted when using the Vanilla
"%s" keybind.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.teleport:
Automatically start spectating players when teleporting
using the spectator hotbar menu.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.openScre:
Shows the currently open screen the spectated
player is looking at. Manually requested screens
such as the inventory can still be opened.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.hideTool:
Hides the tooltip for the hovered item in
synced screens until the mouse is moved.
gui.spectatorplus.config.client.screensN:
Prevents opening a synced screen if another
screen is currently open (such as chat or
the pause menu)
gui.spectatorplus.config.server.allowTra:
Whether player's spectators transfer with them when
travelling between worlds.
gui.spectatorplus.config.server.autoUpda:
Automatically teleports spectators' bodies to their target's position
every second. This is a workaround to mitigate %s.
spectatorplus.no-inventory-permission: You don't have permission to open the inventory of other players on this server
